Package control.customer

package control.customer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BookingHistoryDisplayer
    Displayer class to display booking history of the customer.
    BookingHistoryViewer
    Viewer class that drives the function to enable customer viewing of booking history.
    CustomerAccountManager
    Customer account manager to faciliate customer logins and account creation.
    MovieDetailsDisplayer
    Displayer class to display movie details for a certain movie.
    MovieListDisplayer
    Displayer class to display the list of movies for the customer.
    MovieListViewer
    Viewer class to facilitate customer viewing of movie list, followed by movie details.
    MovieReviewer
    Allows customers to write reviews and rate movies.
    MovieSelector
    Confirms selection of movie for purposes such as viewing, or editing.
    MovieTicketBooker
    Controls the booking process of a movie.
    MovieTimeslotViewer
    Viewer class to facilitate customer viewing of timeslots for a movie, followed by seating details.
    PaymentHandler
    External interface for the handling of payment after booking of tickets.
    SeatDisplayer
    Displays the seating details for a timeslot of a selected movie.
    SeatSelector
    The user selects seats for a particular movie timeslot before booking.
    TicketPriceCalculator
    Allows calculation of ticket prices after user has selected his seats for a particular timeslot.
    TimeslotListDisplayer
    Prints movie timeslots of movies for users.
    TimeslotSelector
    Selects timeslot of a movie for the user to view.
    TopFiveMovieDisplayer
    Prints top 5 lists depending on which top 5 list is enabled.
    TopFiveMovieViewer
    Allows user to view the top 5 movies by rating or ticket sales.
